info.name: Patreon Night Mode
info.description: A simple dark adjustment to Patreon
info.additionalInfo:
This is a work-in-progress, but currently supports the home page, creator pages, and messages. Additional pages will be supported over time.

This latest update should help some of the styles last a bit longer, since the CSS classes change every time Patreon makes an update.

data.title: Blue hard to read text at messages section
